verbs.description: [ARG0: Cleveland Cavaliers forward LeBron James] [V: weighed] in [ARG1: on President Donald Trump canceling the invitation for the Eagles to celebrate their victory over the New England Patriots in Super Bowl LII ( 52 ) by visiting the White House on Tuesday , June 5 , 2018 ( 6/5/18 )] .
